home.heroSubtitle: Gîte, mini-camping, bed & breakfast and table d'hôtes in the Auvergne
home.welcomeText1: Welcome to the website of Les Deux Chevaux, a sunny gîte, a cozy mini-camping, bed & breakfast and table d'hôtes in the beautiful Auvergne, France.
home.welcomeText2: We, Yvonne and Rob, warmly welcome you to our little piece of paradise in the heart of France.
home.whyTheNameText1: The name "Les Deux Chevaux" refers to the iconic French car, the Citroën 2CV - or "deux chevaux" (two horsepower).
home.whyTheNameText2: This car symbolizes the relaxed, authentic French countryside life that we want to offer our guests.

tableSection.title: Table d'Hôtes
tableSection.intro: Table d'hôtes as it should be. Eating together at the long table, a glass of wine, good conversations. Strangers at the start of the evening, friends at the end. Exactly how a holiday should be. Kids are also welcome.
tableSection.description: Enjoy a homemade three-course menu, together at the table, prepared with seasonal products.
tableSection.extras: Extra drinks (beer, soft drinks): €2.50 per glass • More wine? +€2.50 per glass
tableSection.note: One menu for all guests, please notify allergies in advance.
tableSection.kids: Children up to 10 years: main course + dessert or ice cream — €10.00

whoAreWe.title: Yvonne van de Velde & Rob Nijholt
whoAreWe.text1: At the end of June 2013, we moved from Zierikzee, the Netherlands, to the Auvergne in France to start our dream life.
whoAreWe.text2: Now we run our mini-camping and bed & breakfast with great pleasure. We warmly welcome you to share the peace and beauty of the Auvergne with us.
whoAreWe.text3: Whether you come to camp, stay in our Gîte or one of our rooms, or enjoy our table d'hôtes - we make sure you feel at home.
whoAreWe.jipText: And then there's Jip, our faithful companion who loves to greet you on arrival! Jip is always happy to meet new guests and ensures a warm welcome.
whoAreWe.sonsText: For the next two seasons, we're getting help from Paul and Marjolein with their children Mila and Luca. Paul, Rob's son, is taking a gap year to experience adventure in France and help out at Les Deux Chevaux. Whether it's welcoming guests, helping in the kitchen, or maintaining the grounds - with fresh energy and enthusiasm, they complete the team.

whereAreWe.heroSubtitle: Our location in the heart of the Auvergne
whereAreWe.title: Nades, Auvergne
whereAreWe.text: We are located in the picturesque village of Nades (pronounced "nahd"), situated in the far south of the Allier department, one of the four departments in the Auvergne region.
whereAreWe.addressNote: This address is recognized by both Google Maps and TomTom navigation systems.
whereAreWe.distance2: Approximately 750 km from Zierikzee, Netherlands (halfway the southern route)

theRegion.heroTitle: What does the region have to offer?
theRegion.intro1: The Auvergne offers year-round beauty with activities for everyone. It's a place where you can truly unwind.
theRegion.intro2: Leave technology behind and enjoy a complete reset in nature.
theRegion.winterText1: The Auvergne is also beautiful in winter, with opportunities for winter walks and enjoying the tranquility.
theRegion.winterText2: Enjoy the snowy landscapes and the cozy atmosphere by the fireplace.

whatToExpect.heroTitle: What can you expect from us?
whatToExpect.intro: At Les Deux Chevaux, we offer various accommodation options, from camping to luxury rooms, all with the warm hospitality you can expect from us.

red.name: Red Room
red.description: Comfortable and stylishly decorated with private bathroom

chezMarco.name: Chez Marco
chezMarco.description: Cozy house with 1 bathroom and 2 toilets.

longere.name: La Longère
longere.description: Spacious holiday home with large, bright living room and equipped kitchen. 2 bathrooms, 2 toilets. Beds made on arrival, towels provided. Private terrace.

whatToExpect.campingText: We have 6 pitches for tents and caravans, with a relaxed atmosphere and all necessary facilities.

caravan.title: Small Caravan
caravan.text: Cozy caravan for 1-2 persons. Ideal for those who want to camp without their own equipment.

bergerie.title: La Bergerie
bergerie.text: A cozy gnome house with a good bed and 2 chairs. Really only for sleeping - sanitary facilities are in the building next door.

whatToExpect.tableText: Our table d'hôtes offers delicious, freshly prepared meals. Enjoy an authentic French dining experience together with other guests.
